attributes.action: The Speaker must ensure that all questions at PMQs are properly answered.
attributes.additional_details: PMQS is now a national embarrassment. Legitimate questions are frequently deflected or ignored by the Prime Minister, whilst the Speaker looks the other way. The decline in standards at PMQs is the responsibility of the Speaker. He must do his job and ensure that the public and questioner receive a proper answer to each question.
attributes.background: We call on the Speaker to ensure that questions put at PMQs, by democratically elected representatives, on behalf of the public, are properly answered.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
